name: United States
interestingFact: The United States has no official language at the federal level.

name: Canada
interestingFact: Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.

name: Brazil
interestingFact: Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest rainforest in the world.

name: India
interestingFact: India is the largest producer of milk in the world.

name: China
interestingFact: China is the world's most populous country.

name: Australia
interestingFact: Australia is home to more kangaroos than people.

name: Japan
interestingFact: Japan has more than 1,500 earthquakes each year.

name: France
interestingFact: France is the most visited country in the world.

name: Germany
interestingFact: Germany is known for its precision engineering and high-quality cars.

name: Russia
interestingFact: Russia is the largest country in the world by land area.

name: Italy
interestingFact: Italy is home to the world's smallest country, Vatican City.
